Html:
I am trying to figure out whats going on in the Tree of Life model. Most guides I read suggests spirit has a preference over mp5, yet when I look at the scores for gems and enchants it seems like your model prefers mp5. Actually all gems with mp5 are ranked very high, even if they don't have other useful stats.

Am I completely wrong saying that spirit is better for a Tree Druid?
No, you're not completely wrong. Most likely, you don't have talents, buffs, and/or options setup.
It could also be lower-level gear. Spirit scales with intellect now, so if you don't have enough int, spirit won't be as good.
